mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getCodes */ SELECT a.category 'category' ,a.type 'type' ,a.value 'value' ,a.label 'label' ,a.description 'description' ,a.display_order 'displayOrder' ,a.use_yn 'useYn' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM cmm_code a WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(a.category) = UPPER(#{category}) AND UPPER(a.type) = UPPER(#{type}) AND UPPER(a.value) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{value}), '%') AND UPPER(a.label) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{label}), '%') AND UPPER(a.description) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{description}), '%') AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) ORDER BY a.category ASC, a.type ASC, a.display_order ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntForCodes */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cmm_code a WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(a.category) = UPPER(#{category}) AND UPPER(a.type) = UPPER(#{type}) AND UPPER(a.value) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{value}), '%') AND UPPER(a.label) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{label}), '%') AND UPPER(a.description) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{description}), '%') AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn})
/* QUERY ID : getCategories */ SELECT DISTINCT(category) 'category' FROM cmm_code ORDER BY category ASC
/* QUERY ID : getTypes */ SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(type) AS type FROM cmm_code WHERE UPPER(category) = UPPER(#{category}) ORDER BY type ASC

/* QUERY ID : insertCode */ INSERT INTO cmm_code (category, type, value, label, description, display_order, use_yn, creator) VALUES (UPPER(#{category}), UPPER(#{type}), TRIM(#{value}), TRIM(#{label}), #{description}, #{displayOrder}, UPPER(#{useYn}), #{creator})
